trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> instance that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> associada a esta <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.List" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.List" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "ListView".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "ListView".

trans-unit.source: A value in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor na enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the view that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> is using.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para a exibição que este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> está usando.

trans-unit.source: Default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> implementation uses the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />, and this method returns <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: A implementação <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> padrão usa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> e esse método retorna <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer" /> para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The interface instance that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: A instância da interface que está associada a essa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
